text: Na Kiyaram Ami ko siran a manga Yahodi so oman i adun a kanoko niyan, go so Sapi go so Kambing, na KĶiyaram Ami kiran so manga sibo a dowa oto, inonta so ka-a awidan o manga likod a dowa oto, o di na so manga tinai, o di na so minilo-ok ko tolan: Giyoto man i ini badal Ami kiran sabap ko Kiyandarowaka iran: Na Mataan! a Sukamiı i titho a manga Bunar
